title: Crisp and Refreshing
body:
This 12-pack of Waterloo Sparkling Water in lemon-lime flavor arrived well-packaged and properly chilled when opened. The cans are standard 12 oz size with easy-to-open tops, and the packaging clearly lists the ingredients and nutritional information, showing zero calories and no added sugars.

The lemon-lime flavor is noticeable but not overpowering. It has a crisp, fizzy mouthfeel typical of carbonated water, with subtle citrus notes throughout. I noticed the carbonation level stayed consistent from the first sip to the last, and it didn‚Äôt go flat quickly when left open for a short period.

The absence of sweeteners or artificial flavors is clear in the taste ‚Äî it doesn‚Äôt have a sweet aftertaste or heaviness that some flavored waters can have. The cans are convenient for grab-and-go use, fitting easily into a cooler or fridge shelf. After trying multiple cans over a few days, the flavor and fizziness remained consistent across the pack.

Overall, this sparkling water provides a citrus-flavored, fizzy drink option without calories, and it can be a refreshing choice with meals or as a standalone beverage.

title: Pleasantly Surprised.
body:
Before anything, 9/10 - but I would like to get my one negative out of the way.
The 12 pack arrived, inside of an Amazon box, and I am glad that it was packaged like that because my cans arrived damaged, three of them. Two were just warpped, which is no big deal, but one had exploded on the inside of the 12 pack's original packaging, but again thankfully, protected by the extra Amazon box it was packaged in for security, so kudos to that thinking ahead.

Now as someone who has now tried almost every flavor of Waterloo sparkling water, this one is absolutely a treat.
If you can imagine the crisp citrus snap of an orange and the velvet creme of vanilla, if you're feeling nostalgic for an oragne cremesicle, but want none of the brain freeze or guilt, yet all of the flavor? Look no further, my fine taste-budded friend, for you have found the perfect water to quench your thirst on a hot summer day, relaxing by the pool. If you live in an area with poor city water quality, this is actually a better alternative to those with chemicals that you find in most other drinks and some cities. With zero sugar, additives or any of that other toxic stuff you can find on the shelves, this is the most valuable thing you can do for your budget if you're a soda driner looking to cut down, try this. It's so much better for you and more cost effective. You won't regret treating yourself with this one.

title: Tastes like grape soda to me!
body: I love fizzy water, and Waterloo is one of my favorite brands. I have the grape on autoship because I love it so much and the price is so much lower here on Amazon than it is for me locally. To me the flavor is similar to grape soda without all the sugar and artificial colors. I can count on Waterloo for great quality and great taste. Now if they'd just bring back the pineapple, I'd never buy another brand!

title: Good Grape But Aftertaste
body: Nice to find a grape water, and it is fizzy and tasty. Unfortunately, it has a lingering aftertaste.

title: Great price - meh flavors
body:
As a sparkling/carbonated water, it does the job. It's a great deal, and each time I have had it delivered, it's come intact - no problem. So far I have had the peach, strawberry, and blackberry lemonade flavors. To me, the strawberry and peach flavors were in the smell alone. Open the can "ah, that smells like peach/strawberry". Take a sip - "where did the flavor go?". It's there but very faint.

For blackberry lemonade.... it's terrible to me. Open the can and it smells like cough syrup. Take a sip, and it tastes like fizzy cough syrup. So far this is the worst flavor I've tasted.

I might try other flavors but my hopes aren't too high. But I like sparkling water, and all the flavors can't be that bad, right?

title: I like it.
body: I really like this stuff. I was in a quandary. I can‚Äôt drink alcohol or soda pop. Most of the ‚Äúwater‚Äù drinks on the market had additives, artificial sweeteners, or some fruity taste enhancements. I found Waterloo Grape by accident. The grape flavor is mild but enough to give the drink flavor, there are no other additives or salt, and the carbonation is crazy. I like it.

title: A Refreshing Twist on Hydration ‚Äì Waterloo's Blackberry Lemonade Sparkling Water
body:
I recently purchssed this blackberry lemonade sparkling water from Waterloo and I must say, it's a game changer for those of us looking to quench our thirst with something a bit more exciting than plain old water. The first thing I noticed was the burst of flavor. The blackberry and lemonade combination is not only refreshing but also perfectly balanced. It's like a summer afternoon in a can, minus the pesky bees.

What I really appreciate about this sparkling water is its commitment to health. Zero calories, zero sugar, and zero artificial sweeteners? It's like finding a unicorn in the world of flavored beverages. It's reassuring to enjoy a drink that doesn't make me feel like I'm compromising on my health goals. Plus, with no sodium, it's a great option for those who are watching their salt intake.

Now, let's talk about the fizz. It's just right ‚Äì not too overpowering but enough to give that satisfying sparkling sensation. However, I did find that the fizziness doesn't last very long once the can is opened. So, it's best enjoyed soon after cracking it open, unless you prefer your sparkling water on the flatter side, which I guess could be a thing for some people.

One minor quibble is the aftertaste. While not overly pronounced, there's a slight aftertaste that might not appeal to everyone. It's not a dealbreaker for me, but worth mentioning for those with sensitive taste buds.

In summary, Waterloo's blackberry lemonade sparkling water is a delightful treat for anyone looking for a zero-guilt, flavorful drink. It's a fantastic alternative to sugary sodas and a great way to stay hydrated. The balance of flavors and the right amount of carbonation make it a standout choice. Just remember to enjoy it quickly after opening for the best experience!

title: Great product, but much more care needs to be given to the shipping.
body: I love Waterloo, sparkling water best, and the grape is my favorite, well among my favorites. However, I just wish the grape had more flavor. I the past it had more flavor. It satisfied that old school grape soda flavor. Still love it though. But Amazon needs to take much more care with shipping these. Every other delivery of sparkling water has multiple damaged cans, or the ends of the boxes will be open, which won't allow for storage in the closet without them all falling out. So that's the area where they need to do much better, because I like getting them on here because the local stores many times are out of my favorite flavors.

title: A tasty inexpensive option!
body:
The flavor is about what I expected- tasty but not too sweet. Refreshing and no extra sugar. I would recommend it. And I‚Äôll probably try some others too as these are relatively inexpensive compared to some.

I had a few cans that were damaged but no leakage. This is seen in several reviews of this product, but I am unsure why these cans seem to have this effect when other types don‚Äôt seem to have the issue. What I haven‚Äôt seen is a reference to a heavy incense type smell on the packaging. It was obvious as soon as the Amazon box was opened. Even the cans carried a light scent. I would recommend to the seller that this should be avoided. There are those who have sensitivities to scents and it could actually cause a problem for people.

title: Amazon beats the crap out of it during delivery.
body:
Absolutely love these for the price.

The only problem is Amazon delivery frequently beats the crap out of them since they are placed in a delivery box much too large for them without any thing to secure them. They arrive with their box damaged and the cans dented up to the point that you can't open them without it spilling everywhere.

The minus one star is towards Amazon. Waterloo makes an excellent product

title: Tastes like soda water. Yuck!
body: Tastes like soda water. Box was soaked. Not sure if it was from snow or a leaky can. They did wrap the box in plastic.

title: Tasty. Not too weak/strong
body: Good choice if you're looking to cut down on soda or want to try some different sparkling water.

title: Box is destroyed
body: Good value, poor packaging, each time they arrive the box falls apart, it‚Äôs destroyed the drinks are falling out!

title: Excellent
body: This is one of the sparkling waters. I drink that actually has a flavor. Some of the other ones just taste like club soda that say, just drove by a lemon. This is something I buy all the time and I hope they don‚Äôt discontinue this flavor.

title: Simply the best
body: We drink a lot of Waterloo and in South Florida, we fight for the good, tropical flavors. We fell in love with the orange vanilla then couldn‚Äôt get it. It‚Äôs always sold out. Then I learn I can get it here, delivered to my door immediately. I‚Äôm so excited and I hope they keep it in stock. The combination of the orange with the vanilla is amazing. It‚Äôs not a Fanta orange but rather a hint of orange because the vanilla softens it. Definitely our favorite

title: Change the delivery packaging
body: The product is good however when it‚Äôs delivered, the packaging is open because they deliver it in the bag and not a box which is stupid.

title: Great healthy alternative to plain water.
body:
I hate water and I bought these to help me drink more of it. These are great for that purpose but I want to share so others will know they are not sweetened by the fruit. These drinks are 100% healthy with no sugar. So when you take that first sip it will surprise you. My husband thought he would add sugar to his and it fizzed out of the can like a vinegar and baking soda volcano.

I like them and they are helping me drink water.

title: Thirst quencher

title: Love Waterloo, will always support ‚Äîbut...
body:
First of all lemme just get through the reason why I didn't give it a 5 star review, ordered from them twice already, first time the order messed up but they refunded me, and I ordered again (I count this as the entire first time) the cans were popped up but they could still be opened, hence they were still drinkable.
Second time warped cans again, but half of the case because of that were empty because they busted.. So a little bummed I couldn't get my full cases, being that I usually order 2 or more..

DESPITE all of that, they came faster, and the people who delivered were polite and usually knock at my door and wait till I open to leave, and the drinks were still my favorite Orange Vanilla Waterloo drink..

Now let's get to the consumer issue, I seen a lot of comments/reviews talking about how this drink was not good because they weren't sweet enough, and barely had enough this or that in it‚Äîhoney if you were looking for a SODA this isn't your drink, this is advertised as sparkling WATER, it's WATER babes. Naturally flavored WATER, like I want my water to taste like‚Äî... well... water! I have been on a carnivore diet for almost 2 years now, and anything flavored above these drinks are TOO sweet for me. So 0 cals, 0 sugar‚ÄîI'm there!
Sure if you are looking for something that tastes like juice, or soda then yes maybe you should look elsewhere, instead of naturally flavored water... but if you are looking for a sparkling water not mixed with naturally flavored ingredients and rather have something that tastes along the lines of a SODA and whatever they put in it then by all means go look at another carbonated drink because Waterloo is NOT. the. one... But light hints of vanilla, or even the blackberry or pomegranate, they are well balanced to me, I used to drink bubbly before I came to this and there's just something about Waterloo that is so delicious!

Anyways rant over, buy some Waterloo because they are good, delicious, and all together really refreshing. I got my husband addicted and now we buy them any chance we get. Thanks Waterloo! ‚Äîp.s.... Waterloo?.... Can I get a reimbursement for the busted cans?... Or like... A case on the house? I wouldn't mind that. üòå (I'll update to a five star if you doüòè)

body: I've tried a lot of different sparkling waters and this one is definitely one of the best. Will buy again.

title: what I love about peach waterloo sparkling water and amazon bringing on time
body: I have this ordered every month but on occasion I'll find another new drink by waterloo , bubbly or simple truth that has awesome drinks and amazon has them all. Now I order peach because it's one of my favorites by waterloo, I get mango by bubbly because it's easy on my stomach and recently my favorite is lemon lime by some simple truth. Its a great drink that free of salt and sugar. It has no after taste of any sugars and sugars that are substitutes all three are great sparkling water. waterloo has strawberry, grape, lemon lime, peach, cherry limeade(thats my husbands fav) and black raspberry, cherry and a lot others in the waterloo selection some are even mixed with another one yet Im not into anything to busy. Bubbly I found mango so far to be great and some days I crave only that but right now im on a kick for simple truth lemon lime. You get the same amount of drinks 8 cans. same amount 12 ounces and you only pay 2:99$ for this but it could be a special because it's a new drink. strange thing is if I buy this item on amazon or any other site its more expensive but not that IM saying amazon isn't fair but right now the ralphs in mission valley is only charging 2:99 for that and it has so many other kinds but amazon sells them just in bulk so its a bit more expensive yet worth it. If given the chance try cucumber melon it's also really good. I dont like anything sweet so im always buying candy and dried fruit on amazon thats sour and tart and dried fruit not freeze dried candy I get that too but usually its sour beers, hot red tamale brand and tart and sour/ plus mixed berries and tarjin tamarindo get group. I dont always write reviews yet amazon is there and picks up the slack or honors something you ordered that was over night and if its late or you keep getting messages telling you if you dont receive your item by a certain time they'll send it to you immediately, if thats true I wouldn't know but I trust them and they also reimburse you although your getting the item but I suggest you sy no unless you want your items sent to you slower..LOL no Im joking they dont do that but if they send you your item no need to be reimbursed right? Okay don\e with my review hope I could help btw your drinks come overnight. Good luck

title: Packing problem of a great product
body: Waterloo is a great brand and Black Cherry is one of my favorite flavors. I love that there are no nasty-tasting sugar substitutes with unpleasant side effects. The 2-star "demotion" was because, even though the box was securely wrapped and taped with bubble wrap, one end of the box was open and 2 cans were missing. No real biggie, but it *had to have been noticeable when packing. Other water packages in the same box (not Waterloo brand) were intact and not wrapped.

title: Amazing Water, but Poorly Packaged
body: The sparkling water itself? Excellent. Waterloo is easily my favorite sparkling water brand and their range of flavors is wonderful. I've purchased from in stores previously, but have had a hard time finding it again/different flavors, so I decided to order through Amazon. The reason it's getting 3 stars is because 2 of the 3 cases I ordered (all 3 were different flavors) came super damaged. The boxes were ripped open and I assumed they had spilled out because some of the cans were upright while others were upside down. Several cans from both of the damaged cases were totally messed up. Handling of the actual product and the packing of the product needs to be better.

title: Great tasting sparkling water. Please pack product better for mailing. Ty
body: Love the taste. The price used to be lower than anywhere I could I buy where I live but not so anymore. However, it‚Äôs not so ridiculously overpriced that I won‚Äôt buy it from Amazon. Sometimes, it‚Äôs hard to find this flavor at stores. I , for the life of me, can‚Äôt understand why everyone doesn‚Äôt sell it in a 12 pk quantity. I wish Amazon would pack this water better & separately because almost every delivery, the box is damaged & at least 1-4 cans are smashed, the cans are empty & sharp & jagged & anything mailed with it is destroyed,from either water damage &/or the weight of the water crashing around freely in the box.

title: Love Waterloos
body: Love the Waterloo Sparkling water, especially the peach flavor!

title: Bubbly, Tropical, and Almost a Mini-Vacation in a Can
body:
Waterloo Tropical Fruit Sparkling Water is a solid four-star refreshment that brings a burst of the tropics straight to your taste buds. The flavor is bright, fun, and just fruity enough to make you forget you‚Äôre not actually sitting on a beach somewhere (sadly, no palm trees included). With zero calories, zero sugar, and no weird aftertaste, it‚Äôs a great guilt-free choice for when plain water just won‚Äôt cut it.

The carbonation is on point, too‚Äîcrisp and bubbly without being too aggressive. It‚Äôs perfect for sipping straight from the can or pouring over ice with a squeeze of lime for an extra zing. The only thing keeping it from five stars? It‚Äôs delicious but not quite life-changing. Still, it‚Äôs way better than a lot of flavored waters I‚Äôve tried, and I‚Äôll happily keep a few in the fridge for when I need a little tropical pick-me-up.

Pro tip from a guy who knows his sparkling water: Pair it with some fresh fruit slices or use it as a mixer for cocktails or mocktails. It‚Äôll take your drink game up a notch. Four stars for a solid, feel-good fizz. Alright, alright, sparkle-right!

title: Product fine, Delivery 0/10.
body: Product is fine but the delivery SUCKED. Both cases were popped open at both ends and I had to tape them shut. It looks like crap and they‚Äôre a gift for a family member because she loves them.

title: Great product, open box specials
body: Amazing product, but AMAZON always delivers these to us dented, bloated and sometimes the boxes are broken. That being said, we still buy them bc they're delicious. I honestly believe they buy the open box specials from Waterloo. There is no way this is the only Amazon product that consistently come broken.

title: Great taste, great price, BUT‚Ä¶
body:
‚Ä¶a certain number of cans in the shipment always arrive with the top so dented you can‚Äôt open it with the tab and drink it straight from the can. For instance, in the last shipment I received, 5 out of 12 cans were damaged this way. And this does NOT happen when I order similar products from other soda makers, so the problem is clearly not the deliverers but Waterloo itself.

So go ahead and order this, but expect to have to open some of the cans with a can opener and pour it into a glass.

title: Simply the best
body: This is the best soda water brand out there. Just enough fizz to take the enamel right off your teeth,just kidding,! The flavors are spot on and have so much long lasting carbonation. I can't believe it's FREE from SUGAR. YES, THAT'S RIGHT IT ALSO SUGAR FREE AND SODIUM FREE. I generally order a variety of cases, kids love it. The ROSE ALL DAY flavor is remarkably so quenching and It taste just like a wine cooler and get this! There's NO ALCOHOL!!! YAH BABY.. The price is unbelievable. No more sugar highs for the kids and adults. The wiff loves to mix it into cocktails in the summer time out by the pool. All the neighbors are asking , what what what is this refreshing drink? And I say its Waterloo

title: An Invisible Item. Amazing.
body: This is an amazing item. It is so special that I cannot see it with my own eyes, and I cannot feel it with my touch. It was supposed to be delivered yesterday, then delayed until this morning. I still cannot see or touch this product. This product is completely invisible on my front porch. How amazing.
